meanings.definition: A vegetable with green stalks and clustered green flower buds.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating brocoli with my dinner.
meanings.sent2: My mom bought some fresh brocoli from the market.
meanings.sent3: The brocoli jumped off the plate and started dancing!
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a sea of brocoli, swaying in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The brocoli looked like tiny trees in the garden.

meanings.definition: A plant of the cabbage family, Brassicaceae.
meanings.sent1: Brocoli is a healthy plant to grow in your garden.
meanings.sent2: The farmer harvested a lot of brocoli this season.
meanings.sent3: The brocoli plant whispered secrets to the carrots.
meanings.sent4: The field was a patchwork of brocoli, like a green quilt.
meanings.sent5: The brocoli plant stood tall among the other vegetables.
